comments.author: awaq_b@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)

While browsing ANY website, I cannot use "Open link in new window."  Nothing happens.  If I close the browser, I cannot open it again from the desktop icon OR from the folder itself.  Javascript links on webpages will not open.

Reproducible: Always
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)

While browsing ANY website, I cannot use "Open link in new window."  Nothing happens.  If I close the browser, I cannot open it again from the desktop icon OR from the folder itself.  Javascript links on webpages will not open.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: awaq_b@yahoo.com

comments.text:
Also upgrade to firefox 4.0.1
You can download it from http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/new/
